DOC.brief_summary: Aims study : - study incidence rate juvenile idiopathic arthritis ( JIA ) 's clinical subtypes Estonia year 1998-2000 ; - examine course short-term clinical outcome JIA . Method : prospective population-based study carry 14 county Estonia
DOC.criteria: The International League Associations Rheumatology ( ILAR ) criterion juvenile idiopathic arthritis child age 015 year arthritis unknown cause least six week onset disease study period Children infectious arthritis , postinfectious arthritis , traumatic arthritis systemic connective tissue disease
